title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data in a table that is inside a grid cell
OB: When trying to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
EB: When exporting data in two tables, the expected result is that the data should be exported. However, the actual result is that an exception occurs in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() method.
SR: To reproduce this bug, follow these steps: 1. Insert one table into one grid cell. 2. Insert another table into the other grid cell.
